item.title: Run Android Nougat on PC
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Do you have an old computer laying around that you need to find a use for? How about running Android Nougat on your PC? The Android x86 team has successfully ported Android 7.1 over to the desktop CPU architecture. This means you can enjoy your favorite apps and games on any pc orÂ laptop. Run Android Nougat on PC The first thing that you need to do is download the Android Nougat x86 ISO file.
